request.description:
Create a new schedule item.

Looping options: EVERYDAY, WEEKDAYS, WEEKENDS (optional, can be null)

Category options: WORK_ACTIVITY, PERSONAL_TIME, SELF_DEVELOPMENT

response.name: Success
response.body:

request.description:
Submit questionnaire answers and get WLB analysis.

Answer options:
- SANGAT_TIDAK_SETUJU
- KURANG_SETUJU
- NETRAL
- CUKUP_SETUJU
- SANGAT_SETUJU

Expects an array of 23 answers.

response.name: Success

request.description: Delete questionnaire answers for the current user

item.description: Questionnaire management endpoints for work-life balance assessment

item.name: Work-Life Balance (WLB)

request.description: Get today's work-life balance progress for the current user

response.name: Success

request.description: Get the latest work-life balance analysis for the current user

response.name: Success

request.description: Get work-life balance history for the current user

response.name: Success

variable.description: The ID of the recommendation to update

request.description: Update the status of a specific recommendation (mark as completed/incomplete)

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "priority": "High",
  "title": "Luangkan waktu untuk diri sendiri",
  "description": "Alokasikan minimal 30 menit setiap hari untuk aktivitas yang Anda nikmati.",
  "checked": true,
  "userProgressId": 1
}

request.description: Delete all WLB progress data for the current user

response.name: Success

request.description:
Analyze work-life balance questionnaire answers using AI.

Answer options:
- SANGAT_TIDAK_SETUJU
- KURANG_SETUJU
- NETRAL
- CUKUP_SETUJU
- SANGAT_SETUJU

Expects an array of 23 answers and isStudent boolean.

response.name: Success

request.description: Recalculate WLB scores based on completed recommendations

response.name: Success

item.description: Work-Life Balance analysis and progress tracking endpoints

item.name: AI Chat

request.description: Get chat history for the current user

response.name: Success
response.body:
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "userId": 1,
    "message": "How can I improve my work-life balance?",
    "answer": "Halo! Untuk meningkatkan work-life balance, ada beberapa tips yang bisa kamu coba: 1) Tetapkan batasan waktu kerja yang jelas, 2) Prioritaskan waktu untuk aktivitas yang kamu nikmati, 3) Jangan lupa istirahat yang cukup. Mau mulai dari mana?",
    "createdAt": "2026-01-06T09:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2026-01-06T09:00:00.000Z"
  },
  {
    "id": 2,
    "userId": 1,
    "message": "Saya sering merasa stress dengan pekerjaan",
    "answer": "Aku paham perasaanmu! Stress kerja itu wajar, tapi perlu dikelola dengan baik. Coba teknik ini: 1) Ambil jeda 5 menit setiap jam, 2) Praktikkan deep breathing saat merasa overwhelmed, 3) Buat to-do list harian agar lebih terorganisir. Ingat, kesehatan mentalmu itu prioritas! ðŸ’ª",
    "createdAt": "2026-01-06T09:30:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2026-01-06T09:30:00.000Z"
  }
]

request.description: Get remaining chat quota for the current user

response.name: Success

request.description: Send a message to the AI chat assistant for work-life balance advice

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
  "id": 3,
  "userId": 1,
  "message": "How can I improve my work-life balance?",
  "answer": "Halo! Senang kamu bertanya tentang work-life balance! ðŸŒŸ Berikut beberapa tips yang bisa membantu:

1. **Tetapkan Batasan** - Tentukan jam kerja yang jelas dan konsisten
2. **Prioritaskan Self-Care** - Sisihkan waktu untuk aktivitas yang kamu nikmati
3. **Digital Detox** - Kurangi screen time di luar jam kerja
4. **Olahraga Rutin** - Minimal 30 menit aktivitas fisik setiap hari
5. **Quality Time** - Luangkan waktu berkualitas dengan orang terdekat

Mau mulai dari langkah mana? Aku siap membantu! ðŸ’ª",
  "createdAt": "2026-01-06T10:00:00.000Z",
  "updatedAt": "2026-01-06T10:00:00.000Z"
}

item.description: AI-powered chat endpoints for work-life balance assistance
